{"id":1805488599,"question_id":4045,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1760842376,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1841 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1805488599/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Balanced Subarray I","memory":"530.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestBalanced(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n\n        int ans = 0, r=0;\n        for (int l=0; l<N; l++) {\n            unordered_map<int, int> e, o;\n            for (int r=l; r<N; r++) {\n                if (nums[r] % 2) o[nums[r]]++;\n                else e[nums[r]]++;\n\n                if ((int)e.size() == (int)o.size())\n                    ans = max(ans, r-l+1);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-balanced-subarray-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1276}
